name: juanfranciscolebrero-landing
description: Personal landing page for Juan Francisco Lebrero - GenAI Consultant

scripts.validate:html: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const html = fs.readFileSync('index.html', 'utf8'); console.log('HTML validation: OK'); console.log('Sections found:', (html.match(/id="/g') || []).length);"

author: Juan Francisco Lebrero
